page.title: 02Farming - Perry Hill Orchard
page.content: One Thursday two girls from Hartfield School went to the apple orchard to do a survey on the customers,for their favourite apples and fruit. They got a few wild answers but here are the results.5 for Coxs,4 for Jonagold,1 Golden Delicious,2 Red Jonathan, som Coxs were the winner. Then they asked about their favourite fruit: 4 strawberries,1 orange,1 blackberry, 2 raspberries.So strawberries were the winner. The were vegetables on sale,sweet corn,cauliflower,courgettes,runner beans. Varieties of fruit grown at the orchard were: Discovery,James Grieve, Katy, Cox's Orange Pippen,English Golden Delicious,Red Jonathon, Spartan Jonagold,Winston and Bramley cooking apples.
